com.nttdocomo.ui
Class Image

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.nttdocomo.ui.Image
public abstract class Image
extends java.lang.Object

This defines the image. The image class is an abstract class that indicates a static image.
An exception is generated when a method other than dispose is called for the object after calling the dispose method or when it is passed as an argument to a method with an argument that is an image of another class.

Constructor Summary
protected Image()
          An application cannot directly generate an instance of this class.

abstract  void dispose()
          This disposes of the image.
 int getHeight()
          This obtains the image height.
 int getWidth()
          This obtains the image width.

Constructor Detail

Image

protected Image()

Method Detail

dispose

public abstract void dispose()
This disposes of the image.
A UIException is generated when method other than "dispose" is called after calling this method (ILLEGAL_STATE). Nothing generated when the "dispose" method is called after calling this method.

getHeight

public int getHeight()
This obtains the image height.

Returns:
The image height.

getWidth

public int getWidth()
This obtains the image width.

Returns:
The image width.
